WorkItem.Description:
Hi
When I run Rawr 4.1.5.1
I get multiple error messages like this
 
 == Error Message ==
No information was found about this pixel format.
 
and various images for gear and items are blank
WorkItem.Summary: [WPF] No information was found about this pixel format

Comments.Message: are you using the online or offline format?

I was having this problem using the offline downloaded version.
I just tried the online version from Elitistjerks and it seems to work.
I'll just use that version for the time being.
Thanks for the help.
FBT

From what I can tell, it's trying to load the images in asynchronously (which is what it should be doing) but its failing to due to a bad internet connection whic his corrupting the files as they are saved.

Unfortunately since this is just happening to you, I can't repro with your file, there's not much I can do to track it down. I have added an extra error catch with the icon code and that may help you in the next version. Until then, use the Silverlight version.
Just tried Rawr Debug Build (4.1.05.60775) download version and this problem seems to be fixed. Thanks
